amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 118-516 to prohibit the Federal Reserve's Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) pilot programs.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits the Federal Reserve's Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) pilot programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 193 (Roll no. 228).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mooney amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 206 - 193 (Roll no. 228).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
